body.p: An entity shall disclose all of the following:

li.p: the closing balances of assets recognised from the costs incurred to obtain or fulfil a contract with a customer (in accordance with paragraph 91 or 95), by main category of asset (for example, costs to obtain contracts with customers, pre‑contract costs and setup costs); and
the amount of amortisation and any impairment losses recognised in the reporting period.
